fool.name: The Fool
fool.uprightMeaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, and a free spirit. The Fool represents the start of a journey and embracing the unknown with optimism.
fool.reversedMeaning: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration, and foolishness. A warning to think before acting and consider consequences.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.uprightMeaning: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, and inspired action. You have the tools and ability to achieve your goals.
magician.reversedMeaning: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents, and lack of focus. Energy is being misdirected or wasted.

high_priestess.name: The High Priestess
high_priestess.uprightMeaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, and subconscious mind. Trust your inner voice and pay attention to your dreams.
high_priestess.reversedMeaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence. You may be ignoring your inner voice or keeping harmful secrets.

empress.name: The Empress
empress.uprightMeaning: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, and abundance. A time of growth, creativity, and maternal energy.
empress.reversedMeaning: Creative block, dependence on others, smothering, lack of growth. You may be stifling your own or others' growth.

emperor.name: The Emperor
emperor.uprightMeaning: Authority, establishment, structure, and father figure. Leadership, stability, and the need for order and discipline.
emperor.reversedMeaning: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility. Abuse of power or being too rigid in your approach.

hierophant.name: The Hierophant
hierophant.uprightMeaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, and tradition. Learning from established institutions and following conventional paths.
hierophant.reversedMeaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo. Breaking away from tradition and finding your own spiritual path.

lovers.name: The Lovers
lovers.uprightMeaning: Love, harmony, relationships, and values alignment. Perfect union, partnership, and making choices based on love.
lovers.reversedMeaning: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values. Relationship problems or difficulty making important decisions.

chariot.name: The Chariot
chariot.uprightMeaning: Control, willpower, success, and determination. Overcoming obstacles through focus and determination.
chariot.reversedMeaning: Self-discipline, inner guidance, lack of control, lack of direction. You may be struggling to maintain control or direction.

strength.name: Strength
strength.uprightMeaning: Inner strength, courage, persuasion, influence, and compassion. Overcoming challenges through inner power and gentle control.
strength.reversedMeaning: Self doubt, low energy, raw emotion. You may be lacking confidence or struggling with self-control.

hermit.name: The Hermit
hermit.uprightMeaning: Soul searching, seeking inner guidance, and looking inward. A time for introspection and finding your inner light.
hermit.reversedMeaning: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal. You may be isolating yourself too much or avoiding inner work.

wheel_of_fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune
wheel_of_fortune.uprightMeaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, and turning point. A stroke of good fortune and positive change.
wheel_of_fortune.reversedMeaning: Bad luck, lack of control, clinging to control, bad karma. Resistance to change or experiencing setbacks.

justice.name: Justice
justice.uprightMeaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, and law. Seeking truth and making fair decisions based on careful consideration.
justice.reversedMeaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty. Avoiding responsibility or experiencing injustice.

hanged_man.name: The Hanged Man
hanged_man.uprightMeaning: Suspension, restriction, letting go, and sacrifice. A time of waiting, surrender, and gaining new perspective.
hanged_man.reversedMeaning: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision. Unwillingness to make necessary sacrifices or see things differently.

death.name: Death
death.uprightMeaning: Endings, beginnings, change, transformation, and transition. A major life change or transformation is occurring.
death.reversedMeaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging. Fear of change or clinging to the past.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.uprightMeaning: Balance, moderation, patience, and purpose. Finding the middle ground and practicing moderation in all things.
temperance.reversedMeaning: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment. Lack of balance or going to extremes.

devil.name: The Devil
devil.uprightMeaning: Bondage, addiction, sexuality, and materialism. Being trapped by material desires or unhealthy attachments.
devil.reversedMeaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment. Breaking free from negative patterns or addictions.

tower.name: The Tower
tower.uprightMeaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, and awakening. A sudden, disruptive change that clears the way for new growth.
tower.reversedMeaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster. Avoiding necessary change or experiencing inner turmoil.

star.name: The Star
star.uprightMeaning: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, and spirituality. A time of healing, inspiration, and renewed faith in the future.
star.reversedMeaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection. Feeling hopeless or disconnected from your spiritual path.

moon.name: The Moon
moon.uprightMeaning: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, and intuition. Things are not as they seem; trust your intuition to guide you.
moon.reversedMeaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion. Overcoming fears or dealing with hidden emotions.

sun.name: The Sun
sun.uprightMeaning: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, and vitality. Joy, success, and positive energy illuminate your path.
sun.reversedMeaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic. Temporary setbacks or need to reconnect with your inner joy.

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.uprightMeaning: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, and absolution. A time of reflection, evaluation, and spiritual awakening.
judgement.reversedMeaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call, lack of self-awareness. Being too hard on yourself or ignoring your inner voice.

world.name: The World
world.uprightMeaning: Completion, integration, accomplishment, and travel. The successful end of a cycle and achievement of your goals.
world.reversedMeaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cut to success, lack of achievement. Incomplete projects or seeking external validation.
